title: If you don’t believe in Intelligent Design, how would you have made humans better? - Quora

response.answer_text: Humans suck. Like, why do we only have two sets of teeth? That blows. Why can’t we be more like sharks? Sharks have never run out of teeth… when one breaks off… another takes it place! Sharks are awesome. And why can’t we biosynthesis vitamin C? Literally EVERY SINGLE ANIMAL (except guinea pigs and monkeys) can biosynthesis their own vitamin C. Let that sink in… 99.9999999% of all living things can biosynthesis their own vitamin C. But not humans. Humans are too stupid. And wtf is up with wisdom teeth? 85% of people get their wisdom teeth removed at some stage in their life. They say that wisdom teeth were used to grind up leaves and nuts for out evolutionary ancestors… but oh wait you don’t believe in evolution do you? :) And why do our immune systems suck so much? One of my friends is allergic to dairy: her immune system is too incompetent to realise that dairy is, in fact, perfectly harmless. GAHH! And skin cancer! Don’t even get me started on skin cancer… our sole provider of light, warmth, and energy; the sun, is also emits cancer-inducing UV rays. Tusk tusk. Why can’t our skin just be UV-resistant? Cockroaches are. Cockroaches can also withstand small atomic bombs! You’d think that our marvellous man in the sky could as least give us some body armour… sheesh. (ok technically cockroaches can’t withstand nuclear bombs but you get my point) And why are our filtration systems so terrible? 97.5% of earths water is saltwater… and we can’t drink it. But sea lions can… so why can’t we? Of course, sea lions are capable of excreting highly salty urine, but in my opinion, an intelligent designer would grant humans that ability too.

Q: If you don’t believe in Intelligent Design, how would you have made humans better? There’s a serious overhaul required on a few things.  Reproduction. WTF is up with periods? Who would think it a good idea to bleed once a month? I would most definitely question previous market testing methods. I don’t know of any female who delights in getting their period with the associated bloating, bleeding, leaking and PMS (unless there’s a pregnancy scare). “On demand fertilisation” would be the ideal upgrade – with an opt out altogether option.Feelings. They can be very inconvenient. I demand an opt out altogether option for this too. Or at least a ‘suspend’ button or function.Willpower. Lets consider a dial, where I could just turn it on and off as needed. Need will power for something? Spin the dial up! We should consider something similar for enthusiasm.Eyes – we got stiffed. Eagles got a great gig and octopuses did too. Ours are weak and can’t see in the dark for crap.Breakable bones - Some sort of carbon-fibre for bones? I’ve broken several. It wasn’t fun. I want all the bells and whistles. Give me something tough.Limb replacement. Some creatures can replace lost limbs. Let’s make amputation a thing of the past! Let’s just regrow that sh*t.Aging. The built in obsoletion has to go. Very few people would opt for a model that ages so quickly. Let’s fix that up. I don’t want to get nailed by the tough stuff when I get older. No more white hair and wrinkles. No more dull or broken teeth. No more dicky hearts and arthritis. Just an off switch maybe. **The off switch should only be accessible to the owner of the body!Better upgrade potential. Computing companies are always releasing patches to fix issues and upgrade features or provide better protection. We need something like this. I get that we have vaccines but what about the other issues? When people start ‘dabbing’ or using words like ‘fam’ – I’m just confused. If you just supplied me a patch or an update, I could understand what the hell they were on about.Boring design. What if I want to go with natural blue fluorescent hair? (PS - I don’t) Right now, I’d have to dye it. Give me the option to upgrade or change out my eyes, hair and skin. I could go completely green on St Patrick’s day.Mute function. Give me the ability to mute people. Enough said.Reset button. Most player games were you can model your own character have a reset button. If you f*ck it up completely, you can just reset back to factory. If we are going to piss around with the stuff above, I strongly recommend that we install one of these as well.No – I have absolutely no idea how we’d go about doing this. I’m only here to give ideas and I heard there was a buffet lunch included. But seriously. If you sort this stuff out for everybody, I most definitely want to know. I’ll even willingly subscribe to your email newsletter if that’s what it takes. Sign me right the hell up!
